input.sentences: foreigners tour a city they just arrived at .
they love the painting on this restaurant wall .
they try to read what it says | but are n't fluent enough in the language .
so they decide to just appreciate the painting some more .
then | they take a picture of it .
output.sentences: He walked by a mural of a horse.
He stopped to look at it.
The horse's legs were very interesting.
He liked this weird intense horse.
